1{-# LANGUAGE FlexibleInstances #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Tokens in Koshucode.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Token
7  (
8    -- * Subtype name
9    SubtypeName (..),
10
11    -- * Chars
12    Chars, CharsMap,
13    tChars, csT, stringChars,
14
15    -- * Token
16    Token,
17    TToken (..),
18    tokenCp,
19    rawTextToken,
20    unknownToken,
21
22    -- * Subtype
23    -- ** Text
24    TextForm (..),
25    -- ** Local
26    LocalRef (..),
27    -- ** Blank
28    BlankName (..),
29  ) where
30
31import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture         as O
32import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base             as B
33import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol    as S
34
35-- | Type wihch has subtype and its name.
36class SubtypeName a where
37    subtypeName :: a -> String
38
39
40-- --------------------------------------------  Chars
41
42-- | Character sequence.
43type Chars = String
44--type Chars = O.Tx
45
46-- | Mapping from chars to chars.
47type CharsMap = O.Map Chars
48
49-- | Convert textual value to character sequence.
50tChars :: (O.Textual t) => t -> Chars
51tChars = O.tString
52--tChars = O.tTx
53
54-- | Convert character sequence to textual value.
55csT :: (O.Textual t) => Chars -> t
56csT = O.stringT
57--csT = O.txT
58
59-- | Convert string to character sequence.
60stringChars :: String -> Chars
61stringChars = O.stringT
62
63
64-- --------------------------------------------  Token type
65
66-- | String token.
67type Token = TToken Chars
68
69-- | Textual token.
70data TToken t
71    = TText     (B.TCodePos t) TextForm t
72                -- ^ __1 Textual:__ Text — @'code@, @"text"@, etc
73    | TShort    (B.TCodePos t) t t
74                -- ^ __2 Textual:__ Prefixed shorten text — @short.proper@
75    | TTerm     (B.TCodePos t) t
76                -- ^ __3 Textual:__ Term name — @\/term@
77
78    | TLocal    (B.TCodePos t) LocalRef Int [TToken t]
79                -- ^ __4 Symbolic:__ Local name — @^r@, @^\/r@
80    | TSlot     (B.TCodePos t) Int t
81                -- ^ __5 Symbolic:__ Slot name.
82                --   'Int' represents slot level, i.e.,
83                --   0 for local positional slots,
84                --   1 for local named slots,
85                --   2 for global slots
86                --   —  @\@slot@, @\@\@global@
87    | TName     (B.TCodePos t) BlankName
88                -- ^ __6 Symbolic:__ Blank name.
89                --   (This is only used in building content expression)
90
91    | TOpen     (B.TCodePos t) t
92                -- ^ __7 Punctuational:__ Opening bracket — @(@, @{@, @{=@, etc
93    | TClose    (B.TCodePos t) t
94                -- ^ __8 Punctuational:__ Closing bracket — @=}@, @}@, @)@, etc
95    | TSpace    (B.TCodePos t) Int
96                -- ^ __9 Punctuational:__ /N/ space characters
97    | TComment  (B.TCodePos t) t
98                -- ^ __10 Punctuational:__ Comment — @** comment line@
99    | TUnknown  (B.TCodePos t) t B.AbortReason
100                -- ^ __11 Other:__ Unknown token
101
102      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
103
104instance Functor TToken where
105    fmap = tokenFmap    
106
107tokenFmap :: (t -> s) -> TToken t -> TToken s
108tokenFmap f = m where
109    m (TText    cp form t)    = TText    (fmap f cp) form (f t)
110    m (TShort   cp t1 t2)     = TShort   (fmap f cp) (f t1) (f t2)
111    m (TTerm    cp t)         = TTerm    (fmap f cp) (f t)
112    m (TLocal   cp ref n ts)  = TLocal   (fmap f cp) ref n (tokenFmap f <$> ts)
113    m (TSlot    cp n t)       = TSlot    (fmap f cp) n (f t)
114    m (TName    cp n)         = TName    (fmap f cp) n
115    m (TOpen    cp t)         = TOpen    (fmap f cp) (f t)
116    m (TClose   cp t)         = TClose   (fmap f cp) (f t)
117    m (TSpace   cp n)         = TSpace   (fmap f cp) n
118    m (TComment cp t)         = TComment (fmap f cp) (f t)
119    m (TUnknown cp t r)       = TUnknown (fmap f cp) (f t) r
120
121-- | @\"text\"@, @\"open\"@, ...
122instance SubtypeName (TToken t) where
123     subtypeName (TText     _ _ _  ) = "text"
124     subtypeName (TShort    _ _ _  ) = "short"
125     subtypeName (TTerm     _ _    ) = "term"
126     subtypeName (TLocal    _ _ _ _) = "local"
127     subtypeName (TSlot     _ _ _  ) = "slot"
128     subtypeName (TOpen     _ _    ) = "open"
129     subtypeName (TClose    _ _    ) = "close"
130     subtypeName (TSpace    _ _    ) = "space"
131     subtypeName (TComment  _ _    ) = "comment"
132     subtypeName (TName     _ _    ) = "name"
133     subtypeName (TUnknown  _ _ _  ) = "unknown"
134
135instance (O.Textual t) => B.GetCodePos (TToken t) where
136    getCPs tok = [O.stringify $ tokenCp tok]
137
138-- | Code point of token.
139tokenCp :: TToken t -> B.TCodePos t
140tokenCp (TText    cp _ _)    = cp
141tokenCp (TShort   cp _ _)    = cp
142tokenCp (TTerm    cp _)      = cp
143tokenCp (TLocal   cp _ _ _)  = cp
144tokenCp (TSlot    cp _ _)    = cp
145tokenCp (TOpen    cp _)      = cp
146tokenCp (TClose   cp _)      = cp
147tokenCp (TSpace   cp _)      = cp
148tokenCp (TComment cp _)      = cp
149tokenCp (TName    cp _)      = cp
150tokenCp (TUnknown cp _ _)    = cp
151
152-- | Create raw text token.
153rawTextToken :: (O.Textual t) => t -> TToken t
154rawTextToken = TText B.def TextRaw
155
156-- | Create unknown token.
157unknownToken :: B.TCodePos t -> t -> B.Ab a -> TToken t
158unknownToken cp w (Left a)  = TUnknown cp w a
159unknownToken cp w (Right _) = TUnknown cp w $ B.abortBecause "bug?"
160
161
162-- --------------------------------------------  Subtype
163
164-- ----------------------  Text
165
166-- | Subtype of text token.
167data TextForm
168    = TextUnk      -- ^ __1.__ Unknown keyword — @\<unknown\>@
169    | TextRaw      -- ^ __2.__ Naked text — @raw@
170    | TextQ        -- ^ __3.__ Single-quoted text — @\'code@
171    | TextQQ       -- ^ __4.__ Double-quoted text — @\"text\"@
172    | TextKey      -- ^ __5.__ Keyword literal — @\<crlf\>@
173    | TextTerm     -- ^ __6.__ Quoted term name — @'/term@
174    | TextBar      -- ^ __7.__ Text enclosed in bars — @|9:30|@
175    | TextLicense  -- ^ __8.__ Text in license section — @=== license@
176      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
177
178-- | @\"raw\"@, @\"q\"@, ...
179instance SubtypeName TextForm where
180    subtypeName TextUnk      = "unknown"
181    subtypeName TextRaw      = "raw"
182    subtypeName TextQ        = "q"
183    subtypeName TextQQ       = "qq"
184    subtypeName TextKey      = "key"
185    subtypeName TextTerm     = "term"
186    subtypeName TextBar      = "bar"
187    subtypeName TextLicense  = "license"
188
189
190-- ----------------------  Local
191
192-- | Local relation reference.
193data LocalRef
194    = LocalSymbol String     -- ^ Reference to local relation — @^r@
195    | LocalNest S.TermName   -- ^ Reference to nested relation — @^/r@
196      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
197
198-- | Get name of local relation reference.
199instance B.Name LocalRef where
200    name (LocalNest   n) = S.termNameContent n
201    name (LocalSymbol n) = n
202
203
204-- ----------------------  Blank
205
206-- | Blank in form.
207data BlankName
208    = BlankNormal   String
209    | BlankInternal String
210    | BlankPrefix   String
211    | BlankInfix    String
212    | BlankPostfix  String
213    deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
214
215instance B.Name BlankName where
216    name (BlankNormal   n)   = n
217    name (BlankInternal n)   = n
218    name (BlankPrefix   n)   = n
219    name (BlankInfix    n)   = n
220    name (BlankPostfix  n)   = n
221
222-- | @\"normal\"@, @\"internal\"@, ...
223instance SubtypeName BlankName where
224    subtypeName (BlankNormal   _) = "normal"
225    subtypeName (BlankInternal _) = "internal"
226    subtypeName (BlankPrefix   _) = "prefix"
227    subtypeName (BlankInfix    _) = "infix"
228    subtypeName (BlankPostfix  _) = "postfix"
229
